title: For fans!
review: Film that fans will like with a good dose of action, an original story and a lot of fanservice. If you followed the series, you will like it.

title: Trip to My childhood
review:
The Good

I'm very impressed by the quality of the animation and the level of details achived there is a good balance of CGI an traditional animation.

fast and energetic acction scenes, with docens of known enemies

The Bad It should be a reboot instead of a sequel

To many monologes and extensive explanations



The Ugly

Unecesary Japanese Fan Service

title: This is a great robot.
review: Great memories with doses of action more than sufficient, is not perfect but its dose of nostalgia makes us excited. Funny, and amazing.
